member.name: T:FarPoint.Mvc.Spread.FpSpreadExtensions
member.summary: Represents a helper class which provides shortcut functions to render Spread in the MVC Framework.

member.name: M:FarPoint.Mvc.Spread.FpSpreadExtensions.FpSpread(System.Web.Mvc.HtmlHelper,System.String,System.Action{FarPoint.Mvc.Spread.FpSpread})
member.summary: Returns an element that contains the FarPoint Spread.
member.param: The HTML helper instance that this method extends.
The id of the FpSpread instance.
The action which initializes the Spread if it is not sent from the controller.
member.returns: An element that contains the FarPoint Spread.

member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether a file exists in the virtual file system.

member.returns: true if the file exists in the virtual file system; otherwise, false.

member.summary: Determines whether the requested file is from a virtual path.

member.summary: Creates a cache dependency based on the specified virtual paths.
member.param: The path to the primary virtual resource.
An array of paths to other resources required by the primary virtual resource.
The UTC time at which the virtual resources were read.
member.returns: A object for the specified virtual resources.

member.name: T:FarPoint.Mvc.Spread.MvcSpreadModelBinder
member.summary: Defines the methods that are required for an MvcSpread model binder.

example.para: Override the default model binder: ModelBinders.Binders.DefaultBinder = new FarPoint.Mvc.Spread.MvcSpreadModelBinder();
Add a custom model binder: ModelBinders.Binders.Add(typeof(FarPoint.Mvc.Spread.FpSpread), new FarPoint.Mvc.Spread.MvcSpreadModelBinder());

member.name: M:FarPoint.Mvc.Spread.MvcSpreadModelBinder.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: Indicates whether creates a new instance if the specified is not bound. By default, the new instance contains one .

member.name: M:FarPoint.Mvc.Spread.MvcSpreadModelBinder.BindModel(System.Web.Mvc.ControllerContext,System.Web.Mvc.ModelBindingContext)
member.summary: Binds the model by using the specified controller context and binding context.
member.param: The context within which the controller operates. The context information includes the controller, HTTP content, request context, and route data.
The context within which the model is bound. The context includes information such as the model object, model name, model type, property filter, and value provider.
